A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
OK\, my thoughts on the film:

The Good
-Seeing Luke/Hamill once again
-Yoda's appearance
-Action scenes esp the very first one
-Holdo's sacrificial attack

The Bad
-Totally throws away the TFA storylines
-Princess Leia force flying/breathing
-The whole side mission

The Ugly
-The moronic jokes incl Luke's lightsaber toss
-Chase scene that doesn't make much sense
-No emotional investment on the characters ala Rogue One

This movie is entertaining but shallow.  It throws away all the positive hype built by JJ Abrams in TFA.  It lacks purpose\, emotion and character ala Rogue One.
